    <!-- Field: /Page -->
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">Section
1.4&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><U>T
he Bridge Loan</U>.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><U>T
he
Bridge Loan Availability</U>. At Closing and through the Availability 
Termination Date, $15,000,000 is available under the Bridge
Loan subject to the satisfaction of the conditions in Section 8.3. The remaining
portion of the Bridge Loan is uncommitted and
available through the Availability Termination Date and the Administrative Agent
will notify Borrower in writing of any additional
commitment amounts under the Bridge Loan. The Bridge Loan shall be used for the 
purposes set forth in <U>Section 1.4(b)</U> below.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><U>P
urpose
of Bridge Loan Advances</U>. Borrower must use Advances under the Bridge Loan 
exclusively to pay Current Liabilities associated
with development activities on the Properties (or as otherwise Approved by 
Administrative Agent) and the payment of the Advance
Fee in connection with the Bridge Loan.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">Section
1.5&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><U>D
evelopment Plan</U>.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Borrower&rs
quo;s
revised and current Development Plan covering the development activities of 
Borrower is attached to this Agreement as </FONT><U>Schedule
1.5</U><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">. Borrower can propose 
modifications to the Development Plan from time to time,
and those modifications will become effective when Approved (not to be 
unreasonably withheld or delayed) by Administrative Agent.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Administrat
ive
Agent&rsquo;s Approval of a modification to the Development Plan proposed by 
Borrower shall be granted in Administrative Agent&rsquo;s
reasonable discretion. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In
support of each Development Plan, Borrower will prepare and submit to 
Administrative Agent for Approval(not to be unreasonably
withheld or delayed): (i) in the case of costs not yet expended, an AFE 
(including all Supporting Documentation) at least 15 days
before Borrower incurs any costs that it intends to fund out of an Advance or 
(ii) in the case of costs already expended and to
be reimbursed through an Advance, reasonable evidence of a request for payment 
by the applicable Operator and reasonable evidence
of payment by Borrower (collectively, &ldquo;</FONT><U>Reimbursement 
Request</U><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">&rdquo;)
at least 5 days before Borrower requests such an Advance. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstan
ding
the Administrative Agent&rsquo;s Approval of a Development Plan:</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 
0.5in">(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Borrower
must nevertheless satisfy the conditions described in this <U>Article I</U> and 
<U>Section 8.3</U> prior to the making of each
Advance; and</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 
0.5in">(ii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Lenders
will have no obligation to make an Advance to fund projects included on the 
Development Plan:</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1.5in;
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 
0.5in">(A)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;unless
the requested Advance relates to an AFE or Reimbursement Request Approved by 
Administrative Agent; or</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 
0.5in">(B)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;if
the requested Advance (together with all amounts previously Advanced in respect 
of the applicable AFE or Reimbursement Request)
exceeds (1) the cost set forth in the Development Plan for that project, or (2) 
the Loan availability remaining under the Term
Loan.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 13; Value: 2 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1pt 
solid"><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt 
Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><TR><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 
100%"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: PageNo -->6<!-- Field: /Sequence
--></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="page-break-before: always; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 
12pt"><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt 
Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><TR><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 
100%">&nbsp;</TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">Section
1.6&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><U>A
dvance Procedure.</U></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><U>A
dvance
Requests</U>. Subject to the satisfaction of the conditions in <U>Section 
8.3</U>, Borrower can request Advances through the Availability
Termination Date. To request an Advance, Borrower will deliver an Advance 
Request to Administrative Agent by 12:00 p.m. Houston,
Texas time, at least three Business Days prior to the date on which the Advance,
if Approved, is to be made. Each Advance Request
will include invoices or other Supporting Documentation reasonably requested by 
Administrative Agent to support the amounts to
be paid out of the requested Advance. Unless Administrative Agent notifies 
Borrower in writing within that three Business Day
period that it objects or requires additional information with respect to the 
requested Advance (in which case, Administrative
Agent will describe the objection or requested information in reasonable
detail), then Administrative Agent will process the Advance
Request on or before the end of the third Business Day of such three Business 
Day period. All Advances to Borrower under the Term
Loan and Revolving Loan will be made to Borrower&rsquo;s Operating-Checking 
deposit account identified on <U>Schedule 3.42</U>.
All Advances to Borrower under the Bridge Loan will be made to Borrower&rsquo;s 
Blocked Checking Account identified on <U>Schedule
3.42</U></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><U>M
inimum
Advance</U>. The minimum amount of any Advance will be $100,000 unless a lesser 
amount remains available under the Term Loan or
the Revolving Loan, as applicable.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><U>A
uthorized
Signatories</U>. <U>Schedule 1.6(c)</U> identifies and contains a specimen 
signature of each Person authorized to request an Advance
on behalf of Borrower, which schedule may be updated by Borrower upon written 
notice to Administrative Agent delivered in accordance
with <U>Section 12.2</U>. Unless otherwise noted on <U>Schedule 1.6(c)</U>, only
a single signatory is required on an Advance
Request.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><U>U
navailability
of USD</U>. If any non-U.S. Lender notifies Administrative Agent that deposits 
in USD will not be readily available to such Lender
in the relevant interbank market to enable such Lender to fund a requested 
Advance, then (i) Administrative Agent will give prompt
notice of that fact to Borrower, and (ii) the Advance Request will be deemed to 
have been reduced by an amount equal to such Lender&rsquo;s
Percentage Share of the requested Advance and such Lender will have no 
obligation to make its Percentage Share of the requested
Advance; but each other Lender shall remain obligated to fund its pro rata share
of such Advance (calculated as if all Lenders
were participating in the funding of the Advance). At such time as the non-
funding Lender determines that deposits in USD are
readily available in the interbank market to enable such Lender to fund the 
Advance, then the Lender will notify the Administrative
Agent and Administrative Agent will give prompt notice of that fact to Borrower,
and (iii) such Lender shall then fund its Percentage
Share of such Advance so that each Lender will have Advances outstanding in an 
amount equal to its pro rata share of the aggregate
Advances outstanding.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 14; Value: 2 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1pt 
solid"><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt 
Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><TR><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 
100%"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: PageNo -->7<!-- Field: /Sequence
--></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="page-break-before: always; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 
12pt"><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt 
Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><TR><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 
100%">&nbsp;</TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">Section
1.7&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><U>P
romissory Note</U>. Borrower&rsquo;s obligation
to repay the Loan will be evidenced by Promissory Notes in favor of each Lender.
The Advances made by each Lender shall be evidenced
by a single Promissory Note, dated, in the case of (<I>i</I>) any Lender party 
hereto as of the Closing Date, or (<I>ii</I>) any
Lender that becomes a party hereto pursuant to an assignment, as of the 
effective date of the assignment, payable to the order
of such Lender in a principal amount equal to its commitment as in effect on 
such date, and otherwise duly completed. In the event
that any Lender&rsquo;s commitment increases or decreases for any reason, 
Borrower shall deliver on the effective date of such
increase or decrease (and upon the surrender of any then existing Promissory 
Note evidencing the same obligation), a new Promissory
Note payable to the order of such Lender in a principal amount equal to its 
commitment after giving effect to such increase or
decrease, and otherwise duly completed. Each Lender will record on its books the
date, amount and interest rate of each Advance
made by such Lender, as well as a record of all principal payments made by 
Borrower in respect of such Promissory Note. If such
Promissory Note is transferred to another holder, the applicable Lender may 
prepare a schedule of that information and attach
it to such Promissory Note. However, neither an error in the recordation of that
information on such Lender&rsquo;s books nor
the failure to prepare and attach a schedule of that information to such 
Promissory Note when it is transferred to another holder
will affect such Lender&rsquo;s or Borrower&rsquo;s rights and obligations in 
respect of such Promissory Note or the validity
of any transfer of such Promissory Note to another holder.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">Section
1.8&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><U>I
nterest</U><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style:
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Each
Advance under the Loan will bear interest at the applicable Contract Rate 
beginning on the date of such Advance and continuing
until such Advance is paid in full in accordance with this Agreement. If an 
Event of Default exists, all amounts outstanding under
the Loan will bear interest at a rate per annum (the &ldquo;</FONT><U>Default 
Rate</U><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">&rdquo;)
equal to the lesser of (i) the Highest Lawful Rate and (ii) the Contract Rate 
plus 2%. In addition, any amount owing by Borrower
or another Obligor under this Agreement or the other Loan Documents that is not 
paid when due, whether at stated maturity, upon
acceleration or otherwise, will bear interest (both before and after judgment) 
at the Default Rate.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;All
interest will be computed on the actual number of days elapsed over a year 
composed of 360 days with respect to LIBOR Loans and
365/366 days with respect to Base Rate Loans. Interest is due and payable under 
this Agreement in arrears and in immediately available
funds (i) on the last Business Day of each month prior to the Facility 
Termination Date, (ii) on the last Business Day of any Interest
Period, and (ii) in full on the Facility Termination Date.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Borrower
must indicate the Contract Rate for each Advance by delivering a selection 
notice substantially in accordance with this </FONT><U>Section
1.8(c)</U><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none"> (the 
&ldquo;</FONT><U>Selection Notice</U><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&rdquo;)
to the Administrative Agent at least three Business Days prior to the end of the
current Interest Period. Any Advance under the
Term Loan or the Bridge Loan will be a LIBOR Loan. Borrower shall select the 
Contract Rate for any Advance under the Revolving
Loan. If Borrower elects the Prime Rate for an Advance under the Revolving Loan,
then such Advance will be a &ldquo;</FONT><U>Base
Rate Loan</U><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">,&rdquo; and if Borrower 
elects the LIBOR Rate then such Advance will be
a &ldquo;</FONT><U>LIBOR Loan</U><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">.&rdquo; If Borrower fails to timely deliver a Selection
Notice, then such Advance under the Revolving Loan will bear interest at the 
Prime Rate and will be a Base Rate Loan.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 15; Value: 2 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1pt
solid"><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt 
Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><TR><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 
100%"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: PageNo -->8<!-- Field: /Sequence
--></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="page-break-before: always; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 
12pt"><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt 
Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><TR><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 
100%">&nbsp;</TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;There
can be no more than six LIBOR Loans outstanding at any one time.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(e)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Subject
to the provisions of this </FONT><U>Section 1.8(e)</U><FONT STYLE="text-
underline-style: none">, Borrower can elect to continue
all or any part of any LIBOR Loan beyond the expiration of the then current 
Interest Period relating to that LIBOR Loan by giving
at least three Business Days&rsquo; notice (the &ldquo;</FONT><U>Continuation 
Notice</U><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">&rdquo;)
to Administrative Agent prior to the end of the Interest Period. The 
Continuation Notice must specify the amount of the LIBOR Loan
to be continued (in integer multiples of $100,000) and the length of the 
continuation Interest Period. If Borrower fails to timely
deliver a Continuation Notice, then the expiring LIBOR Loan will be converted to
a Base Rate Loan.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(f)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Administrat
ive
Agent&rsquo;s determination of the LIBOR Rate as provided in this Agreement 
will, absent manifest error, be conclusive and binding
on all parties.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(g)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;If,
on or before any date on which Administrative Agent is to determine the LIBOR 
Rate:</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 
0.5in">(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Administra
tive
Agent determines that adequate and fair means do not or will not exist for 
determining the LIBOR Rate applicable to an Interest
Period or, for any reason, Administrative Agent will not be able to determine 
the LIBOR Rate for the applicable Interest Period;
or</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 
0.5in">(ii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Administrative
Agent determines that the LIBOR Rate determined in accordance with this 
Agreement does not accurately reflect any Lender&rsquo;s
cost of funding, making or maintaining that Advance for the applicable Interest 
Period;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify">then Administrative Agent can
give notice of that circumstance to Borrower (a &ldquo;<U>Market Disruption 
Notice</U>&rdquo;), whereupon Lenders&rsquo; obligations
to make the requested Advance on the basis of the LIBOR Rate will be suspended 
until such time as Administrative Agent notifies
Borrower that the circumstances described in the Market Disruption Notice no 
longer exist. If Administrative Agent has issued a
Market Disruption Notice, all subsequent Advances will bear interest at the 
Prime Rate plus (x) the Applicable Margin then in effect
and (y) if an Event of Default exists, 2%, but in no event shall the interest 
rate ever exceed the Highest Lawful Rate.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">Section
1.9&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><U>R
epayment of the Loan.</U></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><U>R
epayment
of the Loan</U>. Except as provided in <U>Sections 1.11</U> and <U>1.12</U>, 
principal on the Loan shall be due and payable on
the Maturity Date. On the Maturity Date, Borrower will pay to Administrative 
Agent, for the ratable benefit of each Lender, all
of the monetary Obligations outstanding on that date (other than Obligations 
that may continue past the Maturity Date under the
terms of the Swap Agreement) and perform or otherwise satisfy all other 
Obligations (other than Obligations that may continue
past the Maturity Date under the terms of the Swap Agreement) then 
outstanding.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 16; Value: 2 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1pt 
solid"><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt 
Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><TR><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 
100%"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: PageNo -->9<!-- Field: /Sequence
--></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="page-break-before: always; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 
12pt"><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt 
Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><TR><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 
100%">&nbsp;</TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><U>A
pplication
of Funds</U>. Except as provided in Section 1.12(b, all payments under the Loan 
will be applied (<I>i</I>)<U> first</U> to unpaid
fees, LIBOR Breakage Costs and Related Costs which Borrower is obligated to pay 
under the Loan Documents, (<I>ii</I>) <U>second
</U>to accrued interest on the Bridge Loan, (<I>iii</I>) <U>third</U> to accrued
interest on the Term Loan, (<I>iv</I>) <U>fourth
</U>to accrued interest on the Revolving Loan, (v) <U>fifth</U> to principal on 
the Bridge Loan, (<I>vi</I>) <U>sixth</U> to principal
on the Term Loan, and (<I>vii</I>) <U>seventh</U> to principal on the Revolving 
Loan until the amount outstanding under the Revolving
Loan is reduced to zero<B>.</B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">Section
1.10&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><U>Time and 
Place of Payments.</U></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><U>P
roject
Account</U>. All payments to be made by Borrower to Administrative Agent under 
this Agreement will be made to the following account
(the &ldquo;<U>Project Account</U>&rdquo;) by wire transfer in immediately 
available funds not later than 11:00 a.m., Houston,
Texas, time on the date due:</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 2in; text-
indent: -1in">&nbsp;</P>
