none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(h)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;change
its fiscal year;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style:
none">(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;cause or allow (to the extent Borrower has the 
ability to prevent such action
through the exercise of all commercially reasonable efforts) (<I>i</I>) the 
release or abandonment of (A) any Well capable of
commercial production, or (B) any of Borrower&rsquo;s Working Interest or Net 
Revenue Interest in any of the Properties
capable of commercial production, or (C) any of the Properties where a Prudent 
Operator would not cause or allow the same to
occur; (<I>ii</I>) the Properties to be developed, maintained or operated in a 
manner less favorable than the actions of a
Prudent Operator; and (<I>iii</I>) waive or agree to make any material 
alterations to the material terms of any Basic
Documents to which Borrower is a party to the extent such waiver or alteration 
could reasonably be expected to have a
Material Adverse Effect, except as made on behalf of Borrower by an Operator who
is not an Affiliate pursuant to the terms of
an Operating Agreement;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(j)&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;except in the ordinary course of
business or as otherwise permitted under
this Agreement, enter into any new agreement relating to or affecting any of the
Properties that could reasonably be expected
to have a Material Adverse Effect;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(k)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;enter
into any new farmout agreement or a material amendment to any existing farmout 
agreement relating to the Properties;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(l)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;allow the purchase and sale of production 
from or allocable to the Properties except
pursuant to Approved Marketing Contracts; </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(m)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;cause
or allow (to the extent Borrower has the ability to prevent such action through 
the exercise of all commercially reasonable efforts)
the commencement of any operation that is not the subject of an AFE or 
</FONT><U>Reimbursement Request </U><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style:
none">Approved
by Administrative Agent excluding emergency operations, operations required 
under contractual obligations that exist on the date
of this Agreement, operations necessary to ensure compliance with any EHS 
Regulation or any other Law; </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(n)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;cause
or allow (to the extent Borrower has the ability to prevent such action through 
the exercise of all commercially reasonable efforts),
subject to </FONT><U>Section 5.12</U><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">, 
the replacement of any Operator; or</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(o)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Cause
or allow its Subsidiaries to incur any Debt except:</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 
0.5in">(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Debt
pursuant to the Hartz Loan Documents existing on the date hereof, which amount 
of Debt is $17,725,000;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 
0.5in">(ii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Debt
existing on the date hereof which is identified on <U>Schedule 6.4(o)</U>;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 
0.5in">(iii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Debt
under the Emerald Basic Documents;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 
0.5in">(iv)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Capital
Leases that do not exceed $250,000 in the aggregate</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>

12pt"><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt

100%">&nbsp;</TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 
0.5in">(v)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Debt
under a Hedging Agreement;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 
0.5in">(vi)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;accounts
payable, accrued expenses, and obligations to pay the deferred purchase price of
property or services that (i) are incurred in
the ordinary course of business, (ii) are not more than 90 days past due or 
otherwise delinquent, and (iii) do not exceed $250,000
in the aggregate (excluding amounts being diligently contested in good faith and
by appropriate action by such Subsidiary and against
which such Subsidiary maintains adequate reserves in accordance with GAAP);</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 
0.5in">(vii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;letters
of credit, worker&rsquo;s compensation claims, surety bonds and performance 
bonds incurred in the ordinary course of business;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 
0.5in">(viii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;endorsements
of negotiable instruments for collection in the ordinary course of business.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">Section
6.5&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><U>L
iens and Encumbrances</U>. Except as set forth
on <U>Schedule 6.5</U>:</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;allow
any Lien to exist or consent to the filing of any financing statement on any 
Collateral except:</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 
0.5in">(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Liens
in favor of Administrative Agent;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 
0.5in">(ii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the
Permitted Encumbrances;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 
0.5in">(iii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Liens
being protested in good faith by Borrower through appropriate proceedings timely
filed and diligently prosecuted and against which
Borrower maintains adequate reserves in accordance with GAAP; and</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 
0.5in">(iv)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Liens
securing Capital Leases permitted by <U>Section 6.1(b)</U> and identified on 
<U>Schedule 6.1(b)</U> or permitted by <U>Section
6.1(d)</U>.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sever
from or reserve out of any Property a right or power to take any action which 
affects the exploration or development of the Hydrocarbons
related to that Property.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">Section
6.6&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><U>A
ffiliate Transactions</U>. Subject to compliance
with the other provisions of this Agreement, enter into a transaction with any 
Affiliate unless (a) the Affiliate has executed
a Subordination Agreement and (b) Borrower has provided reasonably satisfactory
evidence to the Administrative Agent that the
terms of the proposed transaction are at least as favorable as those that 
Borrower could obtain in an arm&rsquo;s length transaction
with a Person that is not an Affiliate.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">Section
6.7&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><U>I
nvestments</U>. Make any Investment except Investments
in (a) Cash Equivalents, (b) obligations of the United States government or any 
of its agencies, (c) guaranties permitted under
<U>Section 6.3</U>, and (d) Investments in connection with the purchase of 
Properties Approved (not to be unreasonably withheld
or delayed) by Administrative Agent.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">Section
6.8&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><U>S
ubsidiaries; Structure</U>. Create any direct
or indirect Subsidiary (other than those set forth on <U>Schedule 3.3</U> or 
make any other material change in the corporate or
capital structure of Borrower. Borrower shall not enter into any arrangement by 
which any Person other than Borrower has the authority
to exercise management over Borrower&rsquo;s and its Subsidiaries&rsquo; 
business or the Properties.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">Section
6.9&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><U>J
oint Ventures</U>. Enter into, agree to enter
into or commit any of the Collateral in connection with the organization of any 
partnership, joint venture or similar arrangement.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align:
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">Section
6.10&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><U>Dividends 
and Distributions</U>. Do any of the following or
take an action that has substantially the same effect:</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;declare
or pay any cash dividends or distributions;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;declare
or make any non-cash distribution;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 0in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 0in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;declare,
make or pay any cash or non-cash distribution to any Emerald US Entity; 
</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;purchase
or redeem any of its Equity Interests or other securities; or</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(e)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;take
any other action that has substantially the same effect as any of the actions 
prohibited under items (a)&ndash;(c) above.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">Section
6.11&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><U>Modification
s to Documents</U>. Waive or modify (or agree
to waive or modify) the terms of any Operating Agreement, any Hedging Agreement 
or any material Basic Document, if such waiver
or amendment could reasonably be expected to have a Material Adverse Effect.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">Section
6.12&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><U>Other</U><FO
NT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;fail
to observe all of the provisions of </FONT><U>Articles&nbsp;IV</U><FONT 
STYLE="text-underline-style: none"> and </FONT><U>V</U><FONT STYLE="text-
underline-style: none">
after the Closing, to the extent not already subsumed in this </FONT><U>Article 
VI</U><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;declare
an &ldquo;</FONT><U>Early Termination Date</U><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style:
none">&rdquo; (as that term may be defined in
the Swap Agreement) or any similar action pursuant to any Hedging Agreement 
without the Consent of Administrative Agent; but Borrower
may declare an Early Termination Date or any similar action under and in 
accordance with the terms of any Hedging Agreement (i)
in respect of any &ldquo;Event of Default&rdquo; (as defined in such Hedging 
Agreement) by the counterparty to such Hedging Agreement
or (ii) in order to close out any transactions then outstanding under such 
Hedging Agreement and pay all amounts due in connection
with the close out of such transactions coincident with the full and final 
repayment or prepayment of all of the Obligations;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;enter
into any Hedging Agreement not Approved by Administrative Agent, such approval 
not to be unreasonably withheld or delayed, but
Borrower agrees that it will not be unreasonable for Administrative Agent to 
withhold its Approval of any Hedging Agreement if
Borrower&rsquo;s counterparty under the proposed Hedging Agreement, is not a 
Swap Counterparty and could have the right to require
Borrower to post any margin or other security to secure amounts owing under the 
Hedging Agreement; </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

    <DIV STYLE="page-break-before: always; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 
12pt"><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt 
Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><TR><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width:

    <!-- Field: /Page -->
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;enter
into a unit operating agreement relating to the Properties outside the ordinary 
course of business; or</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(e)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;adopt
any Employee Plan without the Consent of Administrative Agent which shall not be
unreasonably withheld or delayed.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">Section
6.13&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><U>Use of Loan 
Proceeds</U>. Permit the proceeds of any Advance
to be used for any purpose other than the purposes permitted by this Agreement 
and in a manner consistent with the supporting
documentation provided to Administrative Agent in connection with each Advance 
Request. Neither Borrower nor any Person acting
on behalf of Borrower has taken or will take any action which would reasonably 
be expected to cause any of the Loan Documents
to violate Regulations T, U or X or any other regulation of the Board or to 
violate Section 7 of the Securities Exchange Act of
1934 or any rule or regulation thereunder, in each case as now in effect or as 
the same may hereinafter be in effect.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">Section
6.14&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><U>Limitation 
on Leases</U>. Create, incur, assume or suffer
to exist any obligation for the payment of rent or hire of property of any kind 
whatsoever (real or personal but excluding Capital
Leases and Leases), under leases or lease agreements which would cause the 
aggregate amount of all payments made by Borrower pursuant
to all such leases or lease agreements, including any residual payments at the 
end of any lease, to exceed $250,000<B> </B>in
any period of twelve consecutive calendar months during the life of such
leases.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">Section
6.15&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><U>Nature of 
Business</U>. Allow any material change to be made
in the character of Borrower&rsquo;s business as an independent Hydrocarbon 
exploration and production company. Borrower will
not acquire or make any other expenditure (whether such expenditure is capital, 
operating or otherwise) in or related to, any
oil and gas properties not located within the geographical boundaries of the 
United States.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">Section
6.16&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><U>Deposit 
Accounts</U>. Except for those identified on <U>Schedule
3.42</U>, maintain any additional deposit accounts (as defined in the UCC) 
unless simultaneously therewith, Borrower, Administrative
Agent and the related depositary bank enter into a Deposit Account Control 
Agreement with respect to such deposit account.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">Section
6.17&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><U>No Severance
Agreements</U>. Without the Approval of Administrative
Agent, enter into or become bound by or cause or allow any of the Collateral to 
become subject to any agreement under which Borrower
could become obligated to pay any amounts or make the accommodations to any 
Person, in connection with that Person&rsquo;s resignation,
termination or any similar occurrence.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">Section
6.18&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><U>Commodity 
Deliveries</U>. Enter into obligations to deliver
commodities, goods or services, including Hydrocarbons, in consideration of one 
or more advance payments, other than gas balancing
arrangements in the ordinary course of business.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 54; Value: 2 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1pt 
solid"><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt 
Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><TR><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 
100%"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: PageNo -->47<!-- Field:
/Sequence --></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="page-break-before: always; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 
12pt"><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt 
Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><TR><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 
100%">&nbsp;</TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">Section
6.19&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><U>G&amp;A 
Expenses</U>. Allow the G&amp;A Expenses to exceed
an aggregate of $500,000 per calendar quarter.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">Section
6.20&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><U>Hartz Loan 
Documents</U>. Without the prior Approval of Administrative
Agent, agree, or Cause its Subsidiaries to agree, to amend, modify, restate, 
extend or alter in any material way the Hartz Loan
Documents or to increase the Debt owed to Hartz above $17,725,000 (but, Borrower
shall provide copies of any proposed immaterial
amendments, modification, restatements, alterations or extensions of the Hartz 
Loan Documents to Administrative Agent prior to
executing same).</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">Section
6.21&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><U>Consent to 
AFEs</U>. Without the prior Approval of Administrative
Agent, agree or consent to any AFE presented to Borrower by an Operator and 
related to any Properties in which Borrower&rsquo;s
Working Interest exceeds 1% or where the cost to Borrower pursuant to each such 
AFE is more than $100,000. Administrative Agent&rsquo;s
Approval of such AFE shall in no way be construed as an Approval by 
Administrative Agent to any Advance Request related to such
AFE and Borrower must still comply with the terms and conditions of <U>Article 
I</U>.</P>
<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: center; text-indent: 0in"><FONT STYLE="text-transform: 
uppercase">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: center; text-indent: 0in"><FONT STYLE="text-transform: uppercase">Article
VII<BR>
</FONT>FURTHER RIGHTS OF LENDERS</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">Section
7.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><U>F
urther Assurances; Delivery of Additional Documents</U>.
Until all Obligations are Indefeasibly repaid in full (other than indemnity and 
reimbursement obligations that survive the termination
of this Agreement):</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Borrower
shall, at Borrower&rsquo;s expense, take all actions and execute all additional 
documents reasonably requested by Administrative
Agent and necessary to (i) effect the creation, perfection, maintenance or 
continuation of a first-priority Lien in favor of Administrative
Agent over all of the Collateral, or (ii) assist Administrative Agent&rsquo;s 
exercise of its rights under this Agreement and the
other Loan Documents (collectively, &ldquo;</FONT><U>Implementation 
Documents</U><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">&rdquo;).</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Borrower
appoints Administrative Agent and each of its designees as Borrower&rsquo;s 
attorney in fact to whenever an Event of Default exists
(i) execute, on behalf of Borrower , any Implementation Documents requested by 
Administrative Agent, and (ii) endorse for deposit
into the Project Account any checks or other negotiable instruments payable to 
Borrower and that come into the possession of Administrative
Agent. This appointment is coupled with an interest and is 
irrevocable.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In
exercising the appointment described in </FONT><U>Section 7.1(b)</U><FONT 
STYLE="text-underline-style: none">, neither Administrative
Agent nor its designees will be liable to any Person for any act, omission, 
error in judgment or mistake of law that is not intentional,
willful, grossly negligent or in bad faith.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 55; Value: 2 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1pt 
solid"><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt 
Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><TR><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 
100%"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: PageNo -->48<!-- Field: 
/Sequence --></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="page-break-before: always; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 
12pt"><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt 
Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><TR><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width:
100%">&nbsp;</TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">Section
7.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><U>P
ayments by Lenders</U>. If Borrower fails to (a)
continuously maintain insurance as required by this Agreement or (b) pay any 
amount owed to any Person when due if Borrower&rsquo;s
failure to pay could reasonably be expected to have a Material Adverse Effect, 
Administrative Agent or Lenders can, but will not
have any obligation to, (x) obtain insurance on behalf of Borrower as required 
by this Agreement if such coverage is available
on commercially reasonable terms or (y) pay the unpaid amount(s) on behalf of 
Borrower. Administrative Agent or any Lender will
give Borrower at least three Business Days&rsquo; notice prior to exercising its
rights under the preceding sentence <U>unless
</U>an Event of Default exists, in which case no prior notice will be necessary.
Borrower will reimburse Administrative Agent
or such Lender upon demand for all amounts (including reasonable 
attorney&rsquo;s fees) paid by Administrative Agent or such Lender
to any Person under this <U>Section 7.2</U>. If Borrower fails to reimburse 
those amounts upon demand, the unreimbursed amounts
will become part of the Obligations.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">Section
7.3&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><U>P
ossession and Preservation of Collateral</U>.
If any Event of Default exists, Administrative Agent can, in addition to any of 
remedies available to Administrative Agent, (a)
exercise the rights of a secured creditor under the UCC to enter 
Borrower&rsquo;s premises, (b) take possession of the Collateral
to preserve and prepare the Collateral for sale, and (c) take possession or 
place custodians in control of Borrower&rsquo;s premises
without charge, rent or payment, remain on and use the premises to preserve and 
prepare the Collateral for sale.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">Section
7.4&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><U>I
ndemnification</U><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><B><
U>Borrower
will, to the fullest extent permitted by Law, indemnify and hold harmless
Administrative Agent, Lenders and their respective Related
Parties (collectively, the &ldquo;Indemnified Parties&rdquo;) from and against 
all claims, injuries, damages, judgments, liabilities,
out-of-pocket costs and expenses (including the reasonable fees and expenses of 
counsel), charges and encumbrances (collectively,
&ldquo;Claims&rdquo;) arising from or related to</U></B><FONT STYLE="text-
underline-style: none">:</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 
0.5in">(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B><U>asse
rting,
enforcing or defending the rights of any Indemnified Party under this Agreement 
or any of the other Loan Documents;</U></B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 
0.5in">(ii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B><U>creating,
perfecting, maintaining, or enforcing any Lien;</U></B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 
0.5in">(iii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B><U>taking
possession of, protecting, preserving and preparing for sale any of the 
Collateral when an Event of Default exists;</U></B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 
0.5in">(iv)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B><U>the
acquisition, ownership or operation of any of the Collateral by Borrower or any 
other Person;</U></B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 
0.5in">(v)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B><U>Borrower&r
squo;s
proposed acquisition of any real or personal property;</U></B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 
0.5in">(vi)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B><U>the
failure of Borrower or any other Person to comply with any Law (including any 
Environmental Law) or with the terms and conditions
of any Loan Document;</U></B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 
0.5in">(vii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B><U>the
inaccuracy of any representation or warranty made by Borrower or any other 
Person (other than any Indemnified Party) in any Loan
Document;</U></B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 56; Value: 2 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1pt 
solid"><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt 
Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><TR><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 
100%"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: PageNo -->49<!-- Field: 
/Sequence --></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="page-break-before: always; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 
12pt"><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt 
Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><TR><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 
100%">&nbsp;</TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 
0.5in">(viii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B><U>the
failure of Borrower or any Operator to comply with any EHS Regulation or other 
Environmental Law, including with respect to the
presence, generation, storage, Release, threatened Release, use, transportation,
disposal or arranging for the disposal or treatment
of any Hydrocarbons, Hydrocarbon waste, solid waste or Hazardous Substance on, 
under or from any of the Properties;</U></B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 
0.5in">(ix)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B><U>any
finder&rsquo;s, brokerage, financing or similar fees arising in connection with 
the transactions contemplated by this Agreement;
and</U></B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 
0.5in">(x)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B><U>any
actual, threatened or prospective litigation, investigation or other proceeding 
relating to any of the foregoing, whether based
on contract, tort or any other legal or equitable theory and regardless of 
whether an Indemnified Party is a named party to the
proceeding.</U></B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in;
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><B><
U>The
indemnity obligation owing by Borrower to the Indemnified Parties under this 
Section 7.4</U><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">:</FONT></B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B><U>will be not be limited, modified
or excused by (A) any sole or concurrent
negligence of any Indemnified Party, whether through act or omission, or (B) any
strict liability imposed on any Indemnified
Party; but</U></B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">(ii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B><U>will not be available to an 
Indemnified Party to the extent that the Claim is
determined by the final and non-appealable judgment of a court of competent 
jurisdiction to have resulted from the gross
negligence, bad faith or willful misconduct of that Indemnified 
Party.</U></B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><B><
U>Borrower
shall pay any amounts owing to an Indemnified Party under this Section 7.4 
within 10 Business Days after Indemnified Party makes
a written demand for payment. If Borrower fails to timely pay the amounts owning
under this Section 7.4:</U></B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 
0.5in">(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B><U>if
the unpaid amount is owed to an Indemnified Party other than Administrative 
Agent or any Lender, Administrative Agent or such Lender
may (but will not be obligated to) remit the unpaid amount to that Indemnified 
Party on behalf of Borrower, in which case Borrower
shall reimburse Administrative Agent or such Lender upon demand; and</U></B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 
0.5in">(ii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<B><U>if
Administrative Agent or any Lender is the Indemnified Party to whom the unpaid 
amount is owed (or if Borrower has failed to reimburse
Administrative Agent or such Lender for amounts due under Section 7.4(c)(i)), 
then Administrative Agent can, at its election, (A)
debit and apply funds from the Project Account (and Borrower authorizes and 
directs Administrative Agent to do so) to pay the amount
then owing to Administrative Agent or such Lender under this Section 7.4, or (B)
capitalize the amount then owing and add them
to the Obligations.</U></B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstan
ding
anything to the contrary, any indemnified Taxes shall be covered exclusively by 
</FONT><U>Section 1.15(c)</U><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 57; Value: 2 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1pt 
solid"><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt 
Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><TR><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 
100%"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: PageNo -->50<!-- Field: 
/Sequence --></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="page-break-before: always; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 
12pt"><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt 
Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><TR><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 
100%">&nbsp;</TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: bold 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: center; text-indent: 0in"><FONT STYLE="text-transform: uppercase">Article
VIII<BR>
</FONT>CLOSING; CONDITIONS PRECEDENT</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">Section
8.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><U>C
losing</U>. The &ldquo;<U>Closing</U>&rdquo; of
this Agreement will occur when all of the conditions set forth in <U>Article 
II</U> and in <U>Section 8.2</U> are either satisfied
or waived in writing by Administrative Agent; and the &ldquo;<U>Closing 
Date</U>&rdquo; will be the date on which the Closing
occurs.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">Section
8.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><U>C
onditions to Closing</U>. As conditions to Closing:</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Borrower
will execute and deliver to Administrative Agent each of the Loan Documents to 
which Borrower is a party;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Borrower
will Cause each other party (other than Administrative Agent and Lenders) to 
execute and deliver to Administrative Agent each of
the Loan Documents to which it is a party;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Borrower
will execute and deliver to Administrative Agent the first Advance 
Request;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Administrat
ive
Agent will be satisfied, in its sole and absolute discretion, with the results 
of its business, financial, legal, title, engineering
and environmental due diligence of Borrower and the Properties;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(e)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Borrower
will deliver to Administrative Agent true and complete copies of each Permit 
required to be obtained by Borrower in connection
with the acquisition, ownership and operation of the Properties;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(f)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Borrower
will deliver to Administrative Agent its pro forma financial statements prepared
in accordance with GAAP, except for the omission
of the notes required by GAAP, and subject to the assumptions stated and normal 
&ldquo;year-end adjustments&rdquo; and certified
as of the Closing Date by Borrower&rsquo;s Authorized Officer as fairly 
presenting in all material respects the financial position
of Borrower after giving effect to this Agreement (including the payment of all 
fees and expenses payable in connection with this
Agreement and the initial Advance to be requested by Borrower under the Loan, if
such an Advance is to be requested at Closing);
in addition, Borrower will have no contingent liabilities, liabilities for 
Taxes, unusual forward or long term commitments or unrealized
or unanticipated losses from any unfavorable commitments that are not disclosed 
in the financial statements;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(g)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Borrower
will deliver to Administrative Agent legal opinions satisfactory to 
Administrative Agent and its counsel;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(h)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Borrower
will deliver to Administrative Agent evidence of title reasonably satisfactory 
to Administrative Agent confirming that Borrower
holds Defensible Title to the Properties pursuant to </FONT><U>Section 
5.17</U><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Borrower
will deliver to Administrative Agent:</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 
0.5in">(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;a
true and complete copy of resolutions satisfactory to Administrative Agent (A) 
authorizing Borrower&rsquo;s execution and delivery
of the Loan Documents, the payment and performance of the Obligations, and the 
granting of the Liens contemplated by the Security
Documents, and (B) accompanied by the certification of an Authorized Officer 
that the resolutions have not been amended, repealed
or revoked as of the Closing Date;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 
0.5in">(ii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the
certification of an Authorized Officer as to the name, title and signatures of 
Persons authorized to execute Loan Documents on
behalf of Borrower; and</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 1in; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 
0.5in">(iii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;true
and complete copies of Borrower&rsquo;s Charter Documents and an original 
certificate of existence and/or good standing issued
by the Secretary of State of the jurisdictions in which Borrower is organized 
and conducts operations (in each instance, dated
as of a date acceptable to Administrative Agent), along with the certificate of 
an Authorized Officer that those Charter Documents
and certificates have not been amended, repealed or revoked and remain in effect
on the Closing Date.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(j)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Administrative Agent will be reasonably satisfied with 
its review of Borrower&rsquo;s management and
its back-office, accounting, business and administrative systems and 
functions;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(k)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Borrower
will provide any information required by Section 326 of the USA PATRIOT Act or 
deemed necessary in the reasonable opinion of Administrative
Agent to verify the identity of Borrower as required by Section 326 of the USA 
PATRIOT Act;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in;
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(l)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;no Material Adverse Effect has occurred;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

none">(m)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the
representations of each party to the Loan Documents are true, complete and 
correct;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(n)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;no
suit or other proceeding is pending or threatened seeking to restrain, enjoin, 
declare illegal, recover damages from any Party
or seek any other relief in connection with the transactions contemplated in 
this Agreement;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(o)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Borrower
shall have reimbursed Administrative Agent for all Related Costs incurred by 
Administrative Agent for which invoices have been
presented to Borrower at least one Business Day prior to the Closing 
Date;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(p)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;none
of the transactions contemplated by this Agreement are prohibited by 
Law;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

by Administrative Agent will inspect the Properties
and deliver to Administrative Agent a reasonably satisfactory environmental site
assessment of the Properties; and </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style:

<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in;

none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(r)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Administrative Agent will be satisfied with 
the terms of the Operating
Agreements.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">Section
8.3&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><U>C
onditions to the Making of Each Advance</U>. The
following conditions must be either satisfied or waived in writing by 
Administrative Agent prior to the making of each Advance:</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
conditions described in </FONT><U>Section 8.2</U><FONT STYLE="text-underline-
style: none"> will continue to be satisfied with respect
to the Properties owned by Borrower at Closing or acquired by Borrower with the 
proceeds of an Advance;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Borrower
will prepare, execute and deliver an Advance Request to Administrative Agent and
satisfy the conditions set forth in </FONT><U>Article
I</U><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none"> that relate to the requested 
Advance;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style:
none">(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;With
respect to any development activity to be funded with the proceeds of the 
requested Advance, the development activity is included
on the Development Plan and is the subject of an AFE or </FONT><U>Reimbursement 
Request </U><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">Approved
by Administrative Agent;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;With
respect to any Properties acquired since the Closing Date or, with respect to 
any other Properties, to the extent not previously
delivered to Administrative Agent, Borrower will deliver to Administrative Agent
documentation as Administrative Agent may reasonably
request to satisfy the conditions described in </FONT><U>Section 8.2</U><FONT 
STYLE="text-underline-style: none"> with respect
to those additional Properties as if Borrower had owned them on the Closing Date
(except that the representations and warranties
of Borrower with respect to those additional Properties will be made as of the 
date of the requested Advance);</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(e)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Borrower
will obtain and deliver to Administrative Agent any additional Implementation 
Documents that Administrative Agent may reasonably
request;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(f)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Borrower will deliver to Administrative Agent a true and
complete copy of the Operating Agreement(s)
for each Well to which the Advance Request relates to the extent not previously 
delivered to Administrative Agent, all of
which will be reasonably satisfactory to Administrative Agent;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(g)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;No
Default exists or would result from the making of the requested 
Advance;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in;
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(h)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;No
Material Adverse Effect exists or would result from the making of the requested 
Advance;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The representations of each party to the Loan 
Documents are true, complete and correct on the
date of which the requested Advance is to be made except to the extent any of 
those representations and warranties were made
as of and limited to an earlier date, in which case those representations and 
warranties continue to be true as of that
earlier date;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

none">(j)&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The making of the requested 
Advance will not cause any Lender to violate any
Law;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

none">(k)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;No
suit or other proceeding is pending or threatened seeking to restrain, enjoin, 
declare illegal, recover damages from any Party
or seek any other relief in connection with the transactions contemplated in 
this Agreement;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in;
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(l)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Borrower maintains a commodity price risk 
management program as required by </FONT><U>Section
5.16</U><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none">;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(m)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Borrower
will deliver to Administrative Agent all insurance certificates required under 
this Agreement to the extent not previously delivered
pursuant to </FONT><U>Section 5.8</U><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: none"> 
and, if requested by Administrative Agent, true
and complete copies of any insurance policy maintained by Borrower;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">(n)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;There
will exist no past due bills for improvements or services to the Properties that
could give rise to any Lien, including that of
a mechanic or materialman;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in; 
text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="text-underline-style: 
none">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 0.5in;
