<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-10.6
<SEQUENCE>7
<FILENAME>v319672_ex10-6.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EXHIBIT 10.6
<TEXT>
<HTML>
<HEAD>
     <TITLE></TITLE>
</HEAD>
<BODY STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif">
<P STYLE="margin: 0"></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
center"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
center"><B>EMPLOYMENT AGREEMENT</B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
center"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in">This AGREEMENT (this
&ldquo;Agreement&rdquo;) is made and entered into as of July 26, <FONT 
STYLE="color: black">2012, by and between Voyager Oil &amp;
Gas, Inc., a Montana corporation (the &ldquo;Company&rdquo;), and Paul Wiesner 
(&ldquo;Employee&rdquo;).</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
center"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
center"><B>WITNESSETH:</B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
center"><B>&nbsp;</B></P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in">WHEREAS, the Company
has entered into a Securities Purchase Agreement dated July 9, 2012 (the 
&ldquo;Securities Purchase Agreement&rdquo;), pursuant
to which the Company is purchasing all of the outstanding shares of Emerald Oil,
Inc. (&ldquo;Emerald&rdquo;); and</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in">WHEREAS, Employee is
the Chief Financial Officer of Emerald; and</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in">WHEREAS, the employment
of Employee by Emerald is currently subject to an employment agreement dated 
April 1, 2012; and</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in">WHEREAS, the Company
desires to employ Employee after the consummation of the transaction (the 
&ldquo;Transaction&rdquo;) contemplated by the Securities
Purchase Agreement (the &ldquo;Closing&rdquo;)<B> </B>and Employee desires to be
employed by the Company after the Closing, in
accordance with<B> </B>the terms and conditions set forth herein; and</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in">WHEREAS, the right
and obligations of the Company and Employee set forth in this Agreement are 
effective as of and conditioned upon the Closing; and</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in">NOW, THEREFORE, in
consideration of the promises and mutual covenants contained herein and for 
other good and valuable consideration, the receipt
and sufficiency of which are hereby acknowledged, the Company and Employee 
hereby agree as follows:</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal italic 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 
0pt 27pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="font-style: 
normal">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: normal italic 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 
0pt 27pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="font-style: 
normal">Section
1. <FONT STYLE="color: black"><U>Definitions</U>.</FONT></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(a) &ldquo;Accrued
Obligations&rdquo; shall mean (i) all accrued but unpaid Base Salary through the
date of termination of Employee&rsquo;s employment,
(ii) any unpaid or unreimbursed expenses incurred in accordance with Section 7 
below, (iii) any benefits provided under the Company&rsquo;s
employee benefit plans upon a termination of employment, in accordance with the 
terms contained therein, and (iv) reasonable relocation
costs, to the extent unpaid or unreimbursed, payable to Employee by the Company,
in accordance with written Company policy.</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(b) &ldquo;Affiliate&rdquo;
shall mean any person controlling, controlled by, or under common control with, 
another Person.</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(c) &ldquo;Agreement&rdquo;
shall have the meaning set forth in the preamble hereto.</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(d) &ldquo;Base
Salary&rdquo; shall mean the salary provided for in Section 4(a) below or any 
increased salary granted to Employee pursuant to
Section 4(a).</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(e) &ldquo;Board&rdquo;
shall mean the Board of Directors of the Company.</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 1 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1pt 
solid"><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt 
Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><TR><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 
100%">&nbsp;</TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="page-break-before: always; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 
12pt"><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt 
Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><TR><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 
100%">&nbsp;</TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(f) &ldquo;Cause&rdquo;
shall mean (i) a material breach of the terms and conditions of Employee&rsquo;s
employment agreement with the Company, (ii) Employee&rsquo;s
act(s) of gross negligence or willful misconduct in the course of 
Employee&rsquo;s employment hereunder that is injurious to the
Company or any other member of the Company Group, (iii) willful failure or 
refusal by Employee to perform in any material respect
Employee&rsquo;s duties or responsibilities, (iv) misappropriation by Employee 
of any assets of the Company or any other member
of the Company Group, (v) embezzlement or fraud committed by Employee, or at 
Employee&rsquo;s direction, (vi) Employee&rsquo;s
conviction of, or pleading &ldquo;guilty&rdquo; or &ldquo;no contest&rdquo; to a
felony under United States state or federal law.</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(g) &ldquo;Change
of Control&rdquo; shall mean the first to occur of any of the following:</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 
0.5in; text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 
0.5in; text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(i)
&ldquo;change of control event&rdquo; with respect to the Company, within the 
meaning of Treas. Reg. 1.409A-3(i)(5); or</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt
0.5in; text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 
0.5in; text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(ii)
During any period of two years, individuals who at the beginning of such period 
constitute the Board (and any new Director whose
election by the Company&rsquo;s stockholders was approved by a vote of at least 
a majority of the Directors then still in office
who either were Directors at the beginning of the period or whose election or 
nomination for election was so approved) cease for
any reason to constitute a majority thereof; or</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 
0.5in; text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 
0.5in; text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(iii)
A merger, consolidation, or reorganization of the Company with or involving any 
other entity, other than a merger, consolidation,
or reorganization that would result in the voting securities of the Company 
outstanding immediately prior thereto continuing to
represent (either by remaining outstanding or by being converted into voting 
securities of the surviving entity) at least 50% of
the combined voting power of the securities of the Company (or such surviving 
entity) outstanding immediately after such merger,
consolidation, or reorganization.</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(h) &ldquo;Closing&rdquo;
shall have the meaning set forth in the preamble hereto.</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(i) &ldquo;Code&rdquo;
shall mean the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended.</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(j) &ldquo;Company&rdquo;
shall have the meaning set forth in the preamble hereto, and shall include any 
of its successors or assigns.</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(k) &ldquo;Company
Group&rdquo; shall mean the Company together with any direct or indirect 
subsidiaries of the Company or any of its affiliates.</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(l) &ldquo;Compensation
Committee&rdquo; shall mean the Board or the committee of the Board designated 
to make compensation decisions relating to senior
executive officers of the Company Group.</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 2; Options: NewSection; Value: 2 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1pt 
solid"><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt 
Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><TR><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 
100%"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: PageNo -->2<!-- Field: /Sequence
--></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="page-break-before: always; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 
12pt"><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt 
Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><TR><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 
100%">&nbsp;</TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(m) &ldquo;Disability&rdquo;
shall mean any physical or mental disability or infirmity of the Employee that 
has prevented the performance of Employee&rsquo;s
duties for a period of (i) ninety (90) consecutive days or (ii) one hundred and 
twenty (120) non-consecutive days during any six
(6) month period. Any question as to the existence, extent, or potentiality of 
Employee&rsquo;s Disability upon which Employee
and the Company cannot agree shall be determined by a qualified, independent 
physician selected by the Company and approved by
Employee (which approval shall not be unreasonably withheld). The determination 
of any such physician shall be final and conclusive
for all purposes of this Agreement.</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(n) &ldquo;Dispute&rdquo;
shall have the meaning set forth in Section 19 below.</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(o) &ldquo;Effective
Date&rdquo; shall mean the date on which Closing occurs.</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(p) &ldquo;Employee&rdquo;
shall have the meaning set forth in the preamble hereto.</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(q) &ldquo;Good
Reason&rdquo; shall mean, without Employee&rsquo;s consent, (i) a material 
diminution in Employee&rsquo;s title, duties, or responsibilities,
(ii) the failure of the Company to pay any compensation hereunder when due or to
perform any other obligation of the company under
this Agreement, or (iii) the relocation of Employee&rsquo;s Principal Place of 
Employment by more than fifty (50) miles.</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(r) &ldquo;Initial
Stock Award&rdquo; shall have the meaning set forth in Section 4(b)(i) 
below.</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(s) &ldquo;Person&rdquo;
shall mean any individual, corporation, partnership, limited liability company, 
joint venture, association, joint-stock company,
trust (charitable or non-charitable), unincorporated organization, or other form
of business entity.</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(t) &ldquo;Principal
Place of Employment&rdquo; shall mean Denver, Colorado or any future geographic 
location which is mutually agreed upon by the Company
and Employee.</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(u) &ldquo;Securities
Purchase Agreement&rdquo; shall have the meaning set forth in the Preamble.</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(v) &ldquo;STI
Award&rdquo; shall have the meaning set forth in Section 4(c) below.</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(w) &ldquo;Taxable
Cost&rdquo; shall have the meaning set forth in Section 8(d)(vi) below.</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(x) &ldquo;Term
of Employment&rdquo; shall mean the period specified in Section 2 below.</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(y) &ldquo;Transaction&rdquo;
shall have the meaning set forth in the Preamble.</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal italic 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0;
text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in"><FONT STYLE="font-style: 
normal">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: normal italic 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0;
text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in"><FONT STYLE="font-style: normal">Section
2. <FONT STYLE="color: black"><U>Acceptance and Term of Employment</U>. The 
Company agrees to employ Employee, and Employee agrees
to serve the Company, on the terms and conditions set forth herein. The 
&ldquo;Term of Employment&rdquo; shall mean the period
commencing on the Effective Date and, unless terminated sooner as provided in 
Section 8 hereof, continuing until December 31, 2014;
provided, however, that the Term of Employment shall be extended automatically 
following December 31, 2014 for a one (1) year term
and thereafter for successive one (1) year terms on the first anniversary of the
then current </FONT>term if<FONT STYLE="color: black">
neither the Company nor Employee has advised the other in writing in accordance 
with Section 19 at least sixty (60) days prior
to the end of the then current term that such term will not be extended for an 
additional one (1) year term, subject to the provisions
in Section 8 hereof. <B> </B></FONT></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: normal italic 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0;
text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in"><FONT STYLE="font-style: 
normal"><B>&nbsp;</B></FONT></P>
<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 3; Value: 2 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1pt 
solid"><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt 
Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><TR><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 
100%"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: PageNo -->3<!-- Field: /Sequence
--></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="page-break-before: always; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 
12pt"><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt 
Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><TR><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 
100%">&nbsp;</TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->
<P STYLE="font: normal italic 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0;
text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in"><FONT STYLE="font-style: 
normal">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: normal italic 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 
0pt 27pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="font-style: 
normal">Section
3. <U>Position, Duties, and Responsibilities; Place of 
Performance</U>.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(a) During the
Term of Employment, Employee shall be employed and serve as <FONT STYLE="color: 
black">Chief Financial Officer</FONT> of the Company
and shall have such duties and responsibilities as are commensurate with such 
title. The Employee shall report to the Chief Executive
Officer of the Company and shall carry out and perform all orders, directions 
and policies given to Employee by the Chief Executive
Officer of the Company<B> </B>consistent with his position and title.</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(b) Employee shall
devote his best efforts to the performance of his duties under this Agreement 
and shall not engage in any other business or occupation
during the Term of Employment that interferes with Employee&rsquo;s exercise of 
judgment in the Company&rsquo;s best interests.
Notwithstanding the foregoing, nothing herein shall preclude Employee from (i) 
serving as a member of the boards of directors or
advisory boards (or their equivalents in the case of a non-corporate entity) of 
non-competing businesses, (ii) engaging in charitable
activities and community affairs, and (iii) managing his personal investments 
and affairs;<I> provided</I>,<I> however</I>, that
the activities set out in clauses (i), (ii), and (iii) shall be limited by 
Employee so as not to materially interfere, individually
or in the aggregate, with the performance of his duties and responsibilities 
hereunder.</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal italic 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0;
text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in"><FONT STYLE="font-style: 
normal">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: normal italic 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0;
text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in"><FONT STYLE="font-style: normal">Section
4. <FONT STYLE="color: black"><U>Compensation</U>. During the Term of 
Employment, Employee shall be entitled to the following 
compensation:</FONT></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(a) <FONT STYLE="color: black"><U>Base
Salary</U>. Employee shall be paid an annualized Base Salary, payable in United 
States dollars and less applicable taxes and deductions
and in accordance with the regular payroll practices of the Company, of Two 
Hundred Seventy Five Thousand Dollars ($275,000) with
increases, if any, as may be approved in writing by the Compensation Committee. 
</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 
0.5in; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 
0.5in; text-align: justify; text-indent: 
0.5in">(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Initial
Stock Award</U>. As of the Closing, Employee shall be granted an initial 
aggregate stock award of a certain number of shares of
the Company&rsquo;s common stock pursuant to the Company&rsquo;s 2011 Equity 
Incentive Plan (the &ldquo;2011 Plan&rdquo;), consisting
of 104,167 restricted stock units and stock options for 312,500 shares of the 
Company&rsquo;s common stock (collectively, the &ldquo;Initial
Stock Award&rdquo;). <FONT STYLE="color: black">The Initial Stock Award shall 
</FONT>vest as follows: (1) 25% of such award shall
vest immediately at Closing; (2) 75% of such award shall vest in equal one-third
increments on each of the first three anniversaries
of th<FONT STYLE="color: black">e Closing (25% per year).</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 
0.5in; text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 
0.5in; text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(ii)
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>Initial Grants 
Under Stock<FONT STYLE="color: black"> Plan</FONT></U><FONT STYLE="color: 
black">.
Option and restricted stock unit grants shall be made under the 2011 Plan and, 
to the extent not inconsistent with the terms set
forth herein, will be subject to the terms of the 2011 Plan. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(c) <FONT STYLE="color: black"><U>Subsequent
Equity Awards</U>. Subsequent to the Initial Stock Award, no additional equity 
or equity-related grants shall be granted by the
Company until 12 months from the date of Closing.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 4; Value: 2 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1pt 
solid"><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt 
Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><TR><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 
100%"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: PageNo -->4<!-- Field: /Sequence
--></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="page-break-before: always; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 
12pt"><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt 
Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><TR><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 
100%">&nbsp;</TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(d) <FONT STYLE="color: black"><U>Short-Term
Incentive Awards</U>. In his capacity as Chief Financial Officer of the Company,
Employee shall be eligible for an annual short-term
incentive award determined by the Compensation Committee in respect of each 
fiscal year (or partial fiscal year) during the Term
of Employment (the &ldquo;STI Award&rdquo;) in accordance with this Section 
4(d). The intended target &ldquo;STI Award&rdquo; shall
be up to 100% of Base Salary, and shall be tied directly to performance, based 
on criteria to be determined by the Compensation
Committee at the date hereof (for the initial grant) and during the first fiscal
quarter of each fiscal year, for all subsequent
grants. The criteria applicable to the initial STI Award, and the form and 
timing of payment of the STI Award, are set forth on
Exhibit A hereto, and the criteria applicable to subsequent STI Awards, and the 
form and timing of payment of subsequent STI Awards,
will be set forth in awards adopted by the Compensation Committee during the 
first fiscal quarter of each fiscal year. All such
awards shall be paid less applicable withholdings and deductions.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: normal italic 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 
0pt 27pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="font-style: 
normal">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: normal italic 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 
0pt 27pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="font-style: 
normal">Section
5. <FONT STYLE="color: black"><U>Employee Benefits</U>.</FONT></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(a) <U>General</U>.
During the Term of Employment, Employee shall be entitled to participate in 
health insurance, retirement plans, directors&rsquo;
and officers&rsquo; insurance coverage and other benefits provided to other 
senior executives of the Company, as in effect from
time to time.</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(b) <U>Vacation
and Time Off</U>. During each calendar year of the Term of Employment, Employee 
shall be eligible for twenty (20) days paid vacation,
as well as sick pay and other paid and unpaid time off in accordance with the 
policies and practices of the Company, as in effect
from time to time.</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal italic 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0;
text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in"><FONT STYLE="font-style: 
normal">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: normal italic 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0;
text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in"><FONT STYLE="font-style: normal">Section
6. <FONT STYLE="color: black"><U>Key-Man Insurance</U>. At any time during the 
Term of Employment, the Company shall have the right
to insure the life of Employee for the sole benefit of the Company, in such 
amounts, and with such terms, as it may determine.
All premiums payable thereon shall be the obligation of the Company. Employee 
shall have no interest in any such policy, but agrees
to cooperate with the Company in procuring such insurance by submitting to 
physical examinations, supplying all information required
by the insurance company, and executing all necessary documents, provided that 
no financial obligation is imposed on Employee by
any such documents. Upon the termination of his employment for any reason, 
Company will allow Employee to convert the insurance
policy to a permanent personal life insurance policy.</FONT></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: normal italic 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0;
text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in"><FONT STYLE="font-style: 
normal">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: normal italic 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0;
text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in"><FONT STYLE="font-style: normal">Section
7. <FONT STYLE="color: black"><U>Reimbursement of Business Expenses</U>. 
Employee is authorized to incur reasonable business expenses
in carrying out his duties and responsibilities under this Agreement, and the 
Company shall promptly reimburse Employee for all
such reasonable business expenses, subject to documentation in accordance with 
written Company policy, as in effect from time to
time.</FONT></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: normal italic 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 
0pt 27pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="font-style: 
normal">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: normal italic 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 
0pt 27pt; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0.5in"><FONT STYLE="font-style: 
normal">Section
8. <FONT STYLE="color: black"><U>Termination of 
Employment</U>.</FONT></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(a) <FONT STYLE="color: black"><U>General</U>.
The Term of Employment shall terminate earlier than as provided in Section 2 
hereof upon the earliest to occur of (i) Employee&rsquo;s
death, (ii) a termination by reason of a Disability, (iii) a termination by the 
Company with or without Cause, or (iv) a termination
by Employee with or without Good Reason. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(b) <FONT STYLE="color: black"><U>Termination
Due to Death or Disability</U>. Employee&rsquo;s employment shall terminate 
automatically upon his death. The Company may terminate
Employee&rsquo;s employment immediately upon the occurrence of a Disability. In 
the event Employee&rsquo;s employment is terminated
due to his death or Disability, Employee or his estate or his beneficiaries, as 
the case may be, shall be entitled to: </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 5; Value: 2 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1pt 
solid"><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt 
Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><TR><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 
100%"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: PageNo -->5<!-- Field: /Sequence
--></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="page-break-before: always; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 
12pt"><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt 
Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><TR><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 
100%">&nbsp;</TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 
0.5in; text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(i)
The Accrued Obligations, which amount shall be paid within thirty (30) days from
the date of such termination; and</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 
0.5in; text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 
0.5in; text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(ii)
Any unpaid STI Award in respect of any completed fiscal year that has ended 
prior to the date of such termination, which amount
shall be paid on the sixtieth (60<SUP>th</SUP>) day following the date of such 
termination, subject to Section 8(i) of this Agreement;
and</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 
0.5in; text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 
0.5in; text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(iii)
Any STI Award that would have been payable based on actual performance with
respect to the year of termination in the absence of
the Employee&rsquo;s death or Disability, pro-rated for the period the Employee 
worked prior to his death or Disability, and payable
at the same time as the STI Award would have been paid in the absence of the 
Employee&rsquo;s death or Disability; and</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 
0.5in; text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 
0.5in; text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(iv)
Immediate vesting of any and all equity or equity-related awards previously 
awarded to the Employee,<B> </B>irrespective of type
of award.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in">Following such termination
of Employee&rsquo;s employment by reason of death or Disability, except as set 
forth in this Section 8, Employee shall have no
further rights to any compensation or any other benefits under this 
Agreement.</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(c) <U>Termination
by the Company for Cause</U>.</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 
0.5in; text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 
0.5in; text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(i)
The Company may terminate Employee&rsquo;s employment at any time for Cause; 
<I>provided</I>,<I> however</I>, that with respect
to any Cause of termination relying on clause (i) or (ii) of the definition of 
Cause set forth in Section 1(f) hereof, to the extent
such act or acts are curable, Employee shall be given not less than sixty (60) 
days&rsquo; written notice by the Board of the Company&rsquo;s
intention to terminate Employee&rsquo;s employment for Cause, such notice to 
state in detail the particular act or acts or failure
or failures to act that constitute the grounds on which the proposed termination
for Cause is based, and such termination shall
be effective at the expiration of such sixty (60) day notice period, unless 
Employee has substantially cured, to the Company&rsquo;s
satisfaction, such act or acts or failure or failures to act that give rise to 
Cause during such period.</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 
0.5in; text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 
0.5in; text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(ii)
In the event the Company terminates Employee&rsquo;s employment for Cause, 
Employee shall be entitled only to the Accrued Obligations,
which amount shall be paid within thirty (30) days from the date of such 
termination, and any equity awards or equity-related awards
which are not vested as of the date of termination shall be cancelled. Following
such termination of Employee&rsquo;s employment
for Cause, except as set forth in this Section 8(c)(ii), Employee shall have no
further rights to any compensation or any other
benefits under this Agreement (including, but not limited to, any payment of any
STI Award that has not been paid as of the date
of Employee&rsquo;s termination of employment).</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(d) <U>Termination
by the Company without Cause</U>. The Company may terminate Employee&rsquo;s 
employment at any time without Cause. In the event
Employee&rsquo;s employment is terminated by the Company without Cause (other 
than due to death or Disability), Employee shall
be entitled to:</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 6; Value: 2 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1pt 
solid"><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt 
Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><TR><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 
100%"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: PageNo -->6<!-- Field: /Sequence
--></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="page-break-before: always; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 
12pt"><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt 
Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><TR><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 
100%">&nbsp;</TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 
0.5in; text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(i)
The Accrued Obligations; and</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 
0.5in; text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 
0.5in; text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(ii)
Any unpaid STI Award in respect of any completed fiscal year that has ended 
prior to the date of such termination; and</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 
0.5in; text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 
0.5in; text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(iii)
A lump-sum cash payment equal to two (2) times the target STI Award for the 
fiscal year in which termination occurs, and</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 
0.5in; text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 
0.5in; text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(iv)
A lump-sum payment equal to two (2) years of Employee&rsquo;s Base Salary; 
and</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 
0.5in; text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 
0.5in; text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(v)
<FONT STYLE="color: black">If Executive elects to continue participation in any 
group medical, dental, vision and/or prescription
drug plan benefits to which Executive and/or Executive&rsquo;s eligible 
dependents would be entitled under Section 4980B of the
Code (COBRA), then during the period that Executive is entitled to such coverage
under COBRA (the &ldquo;Welfare Benefits Continuation
Period&rdquo;), the Company shall pay the excess of (i) the COBRA cost of such 
coverage over (ii) the amount that Executive would
have had to pay for such coverage if he had remained employed during the Welfare
Benefits Continuation Period and paid the active
employee rate for such coverage, <I>provided, however</I>, that (A) that if 
Executive becomes eligible to receive group health
benefits under a program of a subsequent employer or otherwise (including 
coverage available to Executive&rsquo;s spouse), the
Company&rsquo;s obligation to pay any portion of the cost of health coverage as 
described herein shall cease, except as otherwise
provided by law; (B) the Welfare Benefits Continuation Period shall run 
concurrently with any period for which Executive is eligible
to elect health coverage under COBRA. Notwithstanding the forgoing, if Employee 
qualifies as a &ldquo;highly compensated individual&rdquo;
(within the meaning of Section 105(h) of the Code), (i) such continuation of 
benefits shall be provided on a fully taxable basis,
based on 100% of the monthly premium cost of participation in the plan less any 
portion required to be paid by Employee (the &ldquo;Taxable
Cost&rdquo;), and, as such, Employee&rsquo;s W-2 shall include the after-tax 
value of the Taxable Cost for each month during the
applicable benefit continuation period, and (ii) on the last payroll date of 
each calendar month during which any health benefits
are provided pursuant to this Section 8(d)(vi), Employee shall receive an 
additional payment, such that, after payment by the Employee
of all federal, state, local and employment taxes imposed on Employee as a 
result of the inclusion of the portion of the Taxable
Cost in income during such calendar month, Employee retains (or has had paid to 
the Internal Revenue Service on Employee&rsquo;s
behalf) an amount equal to such taxes as Employee is required to pay as a result
of the inclusion of the Taxable Cost in income
during such calendar month; and</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 
0.5in; text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 
0.5in; text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(vi)
Immediate vesting of any and all equity or equity-related awards previously 
awarded to the Employee, irrespective of type of award.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in">Any amounts payable
to Employee under clause (i), (ii), (iii) or (iv) of this Section 8(d) shall be 
paid in lump sum on the sixtieth (60<SUP>th</SUP>)
day following the date of Employee&rsquo;s termination of employment, subject to
Section 8(i) of this Agreement. Following such
termination of Employee&rsquo;s employment by the Company without Cause, except 
as set forth in this Section 8(d), Employee shall
have no further rights to any compensation or any other benefits under this 
Agreement.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align:
justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 7; Value: 2 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1pt 
solid"><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt 
Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><TR><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 
100%"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: PageNo -->7<!-- Field: /Sequence
--></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="page-break-before: always; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 
12pt"><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt 
Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><TR><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 
100%">&nbsp;</TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(e) <U>Termination
by Employee with Good Reason</U>. Employee may terminate Employee&rsquo;s 
employment with Good Reason by providing the Company
thirty (30) days&rsquo; written notice setting forth in reasonable specificity 
the event that constitutes Good Reason (which notice
must be given no later than 90 days after the initial occurrence of such event).
During such thirty (30) day notice period, the
Company shall have a cure right (if curable), and if not cured within such 
period, Employee&rsquo;s termination will be effective
upon the expiration of such cure period, and Employee shall be entitled to the 
same payments and benefits as provided in Section
8(d) above for a termination by the Company without Cause, subject to the same 
conditions on payment and benefits as described
in Section 8(d) above. Following such termination of Employee&rsquo;s employment
by Employee with Good Reason, except as set forth
in this Section 8(e), Employee shall have no further rights to any compensation 
or any other benefits under this Agreement.</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(f) <FONT STYLE="color: black"><U>Termination
by Employee without Good Reason</U>. Employee may terminate Employee&rsquo;s 
employment without Good Reason by providing the Company
sixty (60) days&rsquo; written notice of such termination. In the event of a 
termination of employment by Employee under this Section
8(f), Employee shall be entitled only to the Accrued Obligations, and </FONT>any
equity awards or equity-related awards <FONT STYLE="color: black">that
are not vested as of the date of termination shall be cancelled. In the event of
termination of Employee&rsquo;s employment under
this Section 8(f), the Company may, in its sole and absolute discretion, by 
written notice accelerate such date of termination
without changing the characterization of such termination as a termination by 
Employee without Good Reason. Following such termination
of Employee&rsquo;s employment by Employee without Good Reason, except as set 
forth in this Section 8(f), Employee shall have no
further rights to any compensation or any other benefits under this 
Agreement.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(g) <U>Non-Extension
of the Term of Employment</U>. Employee&rsquo;s employment hereunder shall
terminate upon the close of business of the last day
of the then current term if either the Company or Employee gives timely notice 
of its or his intention not to extend the then current
term of employment, as provided in Section 2. If the Company&rsquo;s decision 
not to extend is without Cause, or if Employee&rsquo;s
decision not to extend is with Good Reason, then Employee shall be entitled to 
the same payments and benefits as provided in Sections
8(d) and 8(e) above for a termination by the Company without Cause or a 
termination by Employee with Good Reason, subject to the
same conditions on payment and benefits as described therein. Otherwise, upon 
the termination of the Term of Employment by reason
of the parties&rsquo; non-extension, Employee shall be entitled to the Accrued 
Obligations, which amount shall be paid within thirty
(30) days of such date of termination. Following such termination of 
Employee&rsquo;s employment pursuant to Section 2, except
as set forth in this Section 8(g), Employee shall have no further rights to any 
compensation or any other benefits under this Agreement
and any equity or equity-related awards that are not vested as of the date of 
termination shall be cancelled.</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(h) <U>Termination
Following Change of Control</U>. If, upon a Change of Control of the Company or 
during the twelve (12) month period following such
Change of Control, Employee is terminated by the Company without Cause or 
Employee terminates Employee&rsquo;s employment with
Good Reason, in lieu of the benefits payable pursuant to Sections 8(d) or 8(e) 
hereof, as applicable, Employee shall be entitled
to:</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<!-- Field: Page; Sequence: 8; Value: 2 -->
    <DIV STYLE="margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; border-bottom: Black 1pt 
solid"><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt 
Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><TR><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 
100%"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: PageNo -->8<!-- Field: /Sequence
--></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
    <DIV STYLE="page-break-before: always; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 
12pt"><TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="width: 100%; font: 10pt 
Times New Roman, Times, Serif"><TR><TD STYLE="text-align: center; width: 
100%">&nbsp;</TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
    <!-- Field: /Page -->
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 
0.5in; text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(i)
The Accrued Obligations; and</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 
0.5in; text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 
0.5in; text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(ii)
Any unpaid STI Award in respect of any completed fiscal year that has ended 
prior to the date of such termination; and</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt
0.5in; text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 
0.5in; text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(iii)
A lump-sum cash payment equal to two (2) times the target STI Award for the year
in which termination occurs; and</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 
0.5in; text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 
0.5in; text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(iv)
A lump-sum cash payment equal to two (2) times Base Salary; and</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 
0.5in; text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 
0.5in; text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(v)<B>
</B>Continuation of<FONT STYLE="color: black"> the health benefits provided to 
Employee and Employee&rsquo;s covered dependents
under the Company&rsquo;s health plans, subject to the terms and conditions set 
forth in Section 8(d)(v) above; and</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 
0.5in; text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0 0pt 
0.5in; text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(vi)
Immediate vesting of any and all equity or equity-related awards previously 
awarded to the Employee, irrespective of type of award.</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-align: 
justify; text-indent: 0.5in">Any amounts payable
to Employee under clause (i), (ii), (iii) or (iv) of this Section 8(h) shall be 
paid in lump sum on the sixtieth (60<SUP>th</SUP>)
day following the date of Employee&rsquo;s termination of employment, subject to
Section 8(i) and Section 9 of this Agreement.
Following such termination of Employee&rsquo;s employment following a Change of 
Control, except as set forth in this Section 8(h),
Employee shall have no further rights to any compensation or any other benefits 
under this Agreement.</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="font: normal 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0; text-
align: justify; text-indent: 1in">(i) <FONT STYLE="color: black"><U>Release</U>.
Notwithstanding any provision herein to the contrary, and as a condition 
precedent to payment of any amount or provision of any
benefit pursuant to subsection 8(b), (d), (e) or (g) (other than payment of any 
Accrued Obligations), Employee or Employee&rsquo;s
estate, as applicable, shall execute and shall not rescind, a </FONT>release 
in<FONT STYLE="color: black"> favor of the Company
Group and all related companies, individuals, and entities in a form 
satisfactory to the Company, and any revocation period applicable
to such release must have expired as of the sixtieth (60<SUP>th</SUP>) day 
following Employee&rsquo;s termination of employment.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: normal italic 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0;
text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in"><FONT STYLE="font-style:
normal">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: normal italic 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0;
text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in"><FONT STYLE="font-style: normal">Section
9. <U>Parachute Payments</U>. If any payment or benefit to which Employee may be
entitled in connection with a change in control
(the &ldquo;Payments&rdquo;, which shall include, without limitation, the 
vesting of an option or other non-cash benefit or property)
would (i) constitute a &ldquo;parachute payment&rdquo; within the meaning of 
Section 280G of the Code and the rules and regulations
thereunder and, (ii) but for this sentence, be subject to the excise tax imposed
by Section 4999 of the Code (the &ldquo;Excise
Tax&rdquo;), then such Payments shall be equal to the largest portion of the 
Payments that would result in no portion of the Payments
being subject to the Excise Tax (the &ldquo;Reduced Amount&rdquo;). If a 
reduction in payments or benefits constituting &ldquo;parachute
payments&rdquo; is necessary so that the Payments equal the Reduced Amount, 
reduction shall occur in the manner as determined by
the Company in its sole discretion. Determination of whether Payments would 
result in the application of the Excise Tax, and the
amount of any reduction that is necessary so that the Payments equal the Reduced
Amount shall be made, at the Company&rsquo;s expense,
by the independent accounting firm employed by the Company prior to the date on 
which Employee&rsquo;s right to any Payments are
triggered (if requested at that time by Employee or the Company) or such other 
time as reasonably requested by Employee or the
Company.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font: normal italic 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0;
text-align: justify; text-indent: 1in"><FONT STYLE="font-style: 
normal">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

100%"><!-- Field: Sequence; Type: Arabic; Name: PageNo -->9<!-- Field: /Sequence
